issues.description: In the solution’s Animal class, the abstract method messageOnFeed() is declared with protected visibility, but the UML in the problem statement marks it as public (+ messageOnFeed()). This discrepancy could confuse students about the intended visibility of an abstract method they must implement.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the declaration in Animal.java from “protected abstract String messageOnFeed();” to “public abstract String messageOnFeed();” to match the UML & problem specification.
